price: 50. Notre ordre ne procède que d’un mot, un seul, aussi rapide que l’éclair.[538]
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
footnotes: [538] Littéralement : la promptitude instantanée du regard, le clin d’œil.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
